entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
